item.description:
Gain some hands on experience to get you started in the wonderful world of beading. In this class you will learn about basic stringing materials, tools (cutters, flat nose, round nose and crimp pliers) and crimping techniques to set the foundation for creating earrings, bracelets and necklaces. We will also cover simple loops to create a pair of coordinating earrings. You will leave with at least one completed project, a bracelet, using soft flex.

Dates: Thursday, September 3 at 6:00pm or Saturday, September 12 at 1pm
Duration: 1.5 hours
Fee: $25 + cost of materials (starting as low as $4)

Please contact Abeille at 617.232.4343 to register. Be sure to mention the $5 offer for meetup members at the time of registration.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Beginner Basics - Let's make a bracelet with matching earrings ($25-) $5 off
